name: Tag
responsibilities: Stores a single piece of information

name: Ingredient
responsibilities: + name(), the unique name of this ingredient type

name: RecipeItem
responsibilities: Stores an ingredient for a recipe with a quantity to add to the recipe.
+ ingredient(), gets the type of ingredient that this is
+ quantity(), gets the amount needed for the relevant recipe
+ optional(), marks if this is not required for the recipe

name: Recipe
responsibilities: + items(), the list of recipe Items for this recipe
